title: Manage Offshore Spare Parts Inventory
description: A maintenance supervisor checks the inventory for a critical spare part (a pump seal) on an offshore platform and orders more if needed.

tasks.description: Look up the inventory level for 'Pump Seal P-101' in the platform's inventory management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows only one unit is in stock.

tasks.description: Check the minimum required stock level for this critical part.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the minimum stock level should be three units.

tasks.description: Create a purchase requisition to order two more units to bring the stock up to the required level.
tasks.expected_outcome: A purchase request is created and sent to the onshore procurement team.
